login-require: You need to login to use this feature
login-success-prompt: You have been logged in successfully.
server-error-prompt: There was an error logging you in. Please try again.
request-failed: Request failed. Please check your network and try again.
request-success: Your operation has been successfully executed.
pricing: See model pricing for more details
fatal-tips: Please check your web, browser compatibility first, try clearing your browser cache and refreshing the page. If the problem persists, please download the log and provide the complete reproduction steps to the developer so we can troubleshoot the issue.

market.title: Model Marketplace
market.model-api: Model ID name of the API request

conversation.title: Conversation
conversation.refresh-failed-prompt: There was an error during your request. Please try again.
conversation.remove-description: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the conversation
conversation.remove-all-description: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete all conversations, continue?
conversation.delete-failed-prompt: Failed to delete conversation. Please check your network and try again.

chat.recall-desc: Detected that you have unsent messages last time, has been restored for you.
chat.send-message-desc: Are you sure you want to send this message?

buy.dialog-desc: Are you sure you want to buy {{amount}} points?
buy.failed-prompt: Failed to purchase points, please make sure you have enough balance.
buy.gpt4-tip: Tip: web searching feature may consume more input points
buy.deeptrain-tip: Tip: Once Deeptrain has reloaded to your wallet, come back here and click to buy the appropriate credits
buy.not-config-link: Purchase link is not configured in the background

pkg.title: Packages
pkg.cert-desc: After real-name certification, you can get 50 points (worth 5 CNY)
pkg.teen-desc: After real-name certification, teenagers (18 years old and under) can get an additional 150 points (worth 15 CNY)

sub.title: Subscription
sub.migrate-plan-desc: After changing the subscription, your subscription time will be calculated based on the remaining days price, and the subscription time will be recalculated. (For example, downgrading will double the time, and upgrading will make up the difference)
sub.success-prompt: You have successfully subscribed to {{month}} months subscription.
sub.failed-prompt: Failed to subscribe, please make sure you have enough balance.
sub.disable: This site's subscription feature has been turned off
sub.plan-not-support-relay: Site subscription quota does not cover staging API, please use flexible billing credits for staging API
sub.failed-quota-prompt: Subscription failed, your balance is insufficient ({{quota}} credits)

file.type: Support pdf, docx, pptx, xlsx, image, text and other formats
file.drop: Drag and drop files here or click to upload
file.max-length-prompt: The content has been truncated due to the context length limit
file.over-size-prompt: The size of a single attachment cannot exceed {{size}} MB
file.large-file-prompt: Uploading and parsing large files, please wait patiently
file.empty-file-prompt: File content is empty, has been automatically ignored
file.large-file-success-prompt: Large file parsed successfully in {{time}} seconds

generate.title: AI Project Generator
generate.success-prompt: Project generated successfully! Please select the download format.

api.title: API Key
api.copied-description: API key has been copied to clipboard
api.reset-description: Are you sure? This action cannot be undone. This will permanently reset the API key and the existing API key will expire.

service.title: New Version Available
service.description: A new version is available. Do you want to update now?
service.update-success-prompt: You have been updated to the latest version.

share.title: Share
share.copied-description: Link has been copied to clipboard
share.not-found-description: Conversation not found, please check if the link is correct or the conversation has been deleted
share.name: Conversation Title

invitation.title: Redeem Code
invitation.check-success-description: Redeem Success! You have received {{amount}} points, start your AI journey!

settings.title: Settings
settings.temperature-tip: Random sampling ratio, high temperature produces more randomness, low temperature produces more concentrated and deterministic text
settings.max-tokens-tip: Maximum number of reply tokens, exceeding this value will be truncated (too high value may cause the request to fail due to exceeding the model's maximum token)
settings.top-p-tip: (TopP) The higher the probability value, the higher the randomness generated; the lower the value, the higher the certainty generated
settings.top-k-tip: (TopK) Candidate set size, the larger the randomness of the generation, the smaller the generation, the higher the certainty
settings.presence-penalty-tip: (PresencePenalty) There is a penalty for controlling the likelihood of new topics generated by the model, increasing this value can increase the likelihood of talking about new topics
settings.frequency-penalty-tip: (FrequencyPenalty) Frequency penalty, control the degree of repetition of words generated by the model, increasing this value can reduce the possibility of repetition of words
settings.repetition-penalty-tip: (RepetitionPenalty) Controls the degree of repetition generated by the model. Increasing this value can reduce repetition, but may cause the model to generate incoherent text (similar to FrequencyPenalty)
settings.reset-settings-description: Are you sure? This action cannot be undone. This will permanently reset all settings.

article.title: Batch Generate Articles
article.input-placeholder: Please enter the article title (one line each)
article.prompt-placeholder: Please enter the preset (help AI generate articles, such as: academic paper format, 800 words)
article.web-checkbox: Whether to enable web search function
article.generate-success-prompt: Article generated successfully! Please select the download format.
article.generate-failed-prompt: Failed to generate article, please check your network and try again.

admin.quota-action-desc: Please enter the quota change value (positive for increase, negative for decrease)
admin.subscription-action-desc: Please enter the gift subscription months
admin.operate-success-prompt: Your operation has been successfully executed.

channels.name: Name
channels.name-tip: Channel name, used to identify the channel
channels.priority-tip: When there are multiple channels, the request is made according to the priority order, the higher the priority, the higher the priority
channels.weight-tip: When the priority is the same, the load balancing call is performed according to the weight ratio
channels.retry-tip: When the channel request fails, the maximum number of retries
channels.secret-placeholder:
Please enter the secret, format: {{format}} (<> not filled)
When there are multiple secrets, one line is selected randomly when requesting the load
channels.mapper-tip: Model name conversion to achieve asymmetric model request
channels.mapper-placeholder:
Please enter the model mapper, one line each, format: model>model
The former is the requested model, and the latter is the mapped model (which needs to exist in the model), separated by > in the middle
The format is preceded by! Indicates that the original model is not included in the available range of this channel, such as: !gpt-4-slow>gpt-4, then gpt-4 will not be covered in the available models that can be requested in this channel
channels.group-tip: User group, the group that is not included will not be included in the available range of this channel (when the group is empty, all users can use this channel)
channels.add-custom-model: Add Custom Model (Multiple models are separated by spaces)
channels.group-desc: User type grouping, groups not included will not be included in the available scope of this channel (when the grouping is empty, all users can use this channel), no need to set the grouping for non-special cases
channels.joint-endpoint-placeholder: Please enter the API address of the upstream Chat Nio, for example: https://api.chatnio.net
channels.joint-secret-placeholder: Please enter the API key for upstream Chat Nio
channels.sync-failed-prompt:
Address could not be requested or model market model is empty
(Endpoint: {{endpoint}})
channels.sync-success-prompt: {{length}} models were added from upstream synchronization.
channels.upstream-endpoint-placeholder: Please enter the upstream OpenAI address, e.g. https://api.openai.com
channels.sync-secret-placeholder: Please enter API key for upstream channel
channels.proxy-endpoint-placeholder: Please enter forward proxy address, ex: socks5://example.com: 1080
channels.proxy-desc: Forward proxy, supports HTTP/HTTPS/SOCKS5 proxy (reverse proxy please fill in the access point, no need to set forward proxy in non-special cases)
channels.proxy-username-placeholder: Please enter the agent's authentication username (optional)
channels.proxy-password-placeholder: Please enter the agent's authentication password (optional)

charge.unused-model: Some model billing rules are not set
charge.unused-model-tip: Models not set up by billing rules To avoid losses, regular users will not be able to request
charge.sync-placeholder: Please enter the API address of the upstream Chat Nio, for example: https://api.chatnio.net
charge.sync-failed-prompt:
Address could not be requested or billing rule is empty
(Endpoint: {{endpoint}})
charge.sync-prompt: The rules for {{length}} models have been fetched from upstream and will affect the rules for the current {{influence}} models. Do you want to continue?

system.backendTip: Backend domain name (docker installation default path is/api), used to receive callbacks and storage, etc., default is empty
system.searchTip:
DuckDuckGo search endpoint, if not filled in, use WebPilot and New Bing reverse search function by default.
DuckDuckGo API project build: [duckduckgo-api](https://github.com/binjie09/duckduckgo-api).
system.updateRootTip: Please proceed with caution, after changing the root password, you will need to log in again.
system.updateRootPlaceholder: Please enter a new root password
system.updateRootRepeatPlaceholder: Please enter the new root password again
system.title: Site name
system.titleTip: Site name to display in the site title, leave blank for default
system.logoTip: Link to the site logo to display in the site title, leave blank for default (e.g. {{logo}})
system.backendPlaceholder: Backend callback domain name, empty by default, required for accepting callbacks (e.g. {{backend}})
system.docsTip: Document link, leave blank for default https://docs.chatnio.net
system.filePlaceholder: File parsing service, leave blank for default https://blob.chatnio.net (stability not guaranteed)
system.fileTip: For file parsing services, please refer to the [chatnio-blob-service] (https://github.com/Deeptrain-Community/chatnio-blob-service) project to build.
system.announcementPlaceholder: Please enter a site announcement (Markdown/HTML format supported)
system.customWhitelistPlaceholder: Please enter a list of custom domain suffixes (which will appear in the list of options to choose from), separated by commas, e.g.: example.com, example.net
system.buyLinkPlaceholder: Please enter the card secret purchase link, leave blank to not show the purchase button
system.mailConfNotValid: SMTP send parameters are not configured correctly, mailbox verification is disabled
system.articleTip: Batch post generation function grouping, after checking the current user group can use batch post generation function
system.generateTip: AI project generator grouping, after checking the current user group can use AI project generator
system.cacheTip: Cacheable model, after checking the current model can be cached and hit the cache
system.cacheExpiredTip: Cache expiration time (in seconds), default 1 hour
system.cacheSizeTip: Maximum cache likelihood, that is, the maximum cache likelihood of the same type of input parameter. If the parameter is 1, the maximum cache content is 1, and the requested content will be directly hit. If the parameter is 4, there are 4 returned contents, and the requested content will be hit one of them.
system.closeRegistrationTip: Registration is paused, new users will not be able to register after closing
system.footerPlaceholder: Please enter footer information (Markdown/HTML format supported)
system.relayPlanTip:
Subscription quota supports the transit API, after opening the transit API billing will give priority to the use of user subscription quota
(Tip: Subscription is a quota of times, the model of billing for tokens may affect the cost)
system.searchQueryTip: Maximum number of search results, default is 5
system.image_storeTip: Images generated by the OpenAI channel DALL-E will be stored on the server to prevent invalidation of the images
system.image_storeNoBackend: No backend domain configured, cannot enable image storage
system.closeRelayTip: Turn off the staging API, the staging API will not be available after turning off
system.debugModeTip: Debug mode, after turning on, the log will output detailed request parameters and other logs for troubleshooting

admin.invitation-tips: Invitation codes are used to redeem points. Each type of invitation code can only be used once by one user (can be used for publicity)
admin.redeem-tips: Redemption codes are used to redeem credits and can be used to pay for card issuance, etc.

market.title: Marketplace
market.model-name-placeholder: Please enter the model nickname (e.g. GPT-4)
market.model-id-placeholder: Please enter the model ID (e.g. gpt-4-0613)
market.model-context-tip: Whether the model is a high context model (high context model files are not truncated by long content when parsed)
market.model-is-default-tip: Whether the model is added to the default model list (models not added to the default model list will not appear in the home model list by default)
market.update-success-prompt: Model Marketplace updated successfully (refresh your browser to apply now)
market.sync-placeholder: Please enter the API address of the upstream Chat Nio, for example: https://api.chatnio.net
market.sync-failed-prompt:
Address could not be requested or model market model is empty
(Endpoint: {{endpoint}})
market.sync-items: A total of {{length}} models have been found, {{exist}} models have been found (will not be overwritten), {{new}} models have been added (all synchronized), {{support}} models have been supported by this site channel (synchronized supported models)
market.sync-success-prompt: Synced from upstream, added {{length}} models, please check and click submit to take effect, otherwise it will not be saved

plan.item-id-placeholder: Please enter Entity ID (Item ID cannot be used more than once, ex: gpt-4)
plan.item-name-placeholder: Please enter the entity name (Item Name is used to display the entity name in the subscription list, e.g. GPT-4)
plan.item-icon-tip: Entity icons (icons used by Item Icons to appear in the subscription list)
plan.item-models-tip: The models covered by the entity (Item Models are used to display the models in the subscription list)
plan.sync-placeholder: Please enter the API address of the upstream Chat Nio, for example: https://api.chatnio.net
plan.sync-result: The number of upstream subscription rules was found to be {{length}}, covering {{models}} models. Do you want to overwrite the subscription rules on this site?

admin.user-type-chart-tip: Other paying users: refers to users who subscribe to expired users or users whose points exceed the current initial points (operations such as using invitation codes will also be counted as changes in points increase)
admin.release-subscription-action-desc: Free up subscription usage for users?
admin.subscription-level-desc: Set the subscription level of the user (0 for regular users, 1 for basic subscriptions, 2 for standard subscriptions, 3 for professional subscriptions)
admin.password-action-desc: Please enter the user's new password
admin.email-action-desc: Please enter the user's new email
admin.default-password-prompt: Your administrator password is the default password. For the security of your account, please change your password as soon as possible. (Go to Back Office - System Settings - Change Root Password)
admin.set-admin-action-desc: Are you sure you want to make this user an admin?
admin.cancel-admin-action-desc: Are you sure you want to remove admin access for this user?
admin.ban-action-desc: Are you sure you want to ban this user?
admin.unban-action-desc: Are you sure you want to unblock this user?
admin.chatnio-format-only: This format is unique to Chat Nio
admin.broadcast-tip: Notifications will only show the most recent one and will only be notified once. Site announcements can be set in the system settings. The pop-up window will be displayed on the homepage for the first time and subsequent viewing will be supported.

auth.username-or-email-placeholder: Please enter your username or mailbox
auth.reset-success-prompt: Your password has been reset, please log in with your new password.
auth.send-code-success-prompt: The verification code has been sent to your email, please check it.
auth.send-code-failed-prompt: Failed to send verification code, reason: {{reason}}
auth.disabled-mail: The mailbox of the current site has been disabled, please contact the administrator to enable the mailing function.

title: Title
